levelDescription: A big room with a two red armchairs in front of a fireplace. There are some painting hanging on the walls. You can feel the heat emitting from the fireplace, the flame is dancing so violently. The fireplace could be useful later on...

An old kitchen, but some modern modifications. There are some plates and glasses in the sink that needs to be washed. By the looks of it, it seems that the person who lived here hasn't done her or his dishes for a while. The fridge is pretty dusty and the dust is covering the photograph on the fridge. You can't figure out what is in the picture because of all the dust. There is also a staircase leading down to the basement.

A small hall with a clothing rack on the side and a small red carpet with the letter 'A' on it. Why the letter 'A'? There are also some pictures and the wall, however, you can't seem to see persons' faces in the pictures for some reasons. Every face is blurry. Beneath the pictures there is a small table with a bowl, the bowl contains car keys. There is a staircase leading up to the upper floor.

There nothing much up here except a door, which you guess is the bedroom, an attic and a window which is painted black, but somehow the sunlight still shines through the black paint. There is a staircase leading down to the hall.

The attic is very dark, but the sunbeams from the windows makes it much easier to distinguish what hides behind the dark. There are some boxes with the label 'memories'. In the middle of the attic is a grey key.

It looks like a regular bedroom, the walls are red, a bookcase filled with obviously books, photos, a tiny leather boot and a box full of old watches. There is a big round window in the room which is painted black, but it doesn't block the sunlight which is kind of odd. In the center of the bedroom, there is a canvas which is painted red.

It's cold in the basement. There is not so much down here, just some old furnitures and some boxes filled with old toys, pictures, watches and so on. Most of it seems to be covered by a red cloth to protect them from getting all dusty, except a ladder which is leaning on the wall. There is a staircase leading up.
